features: Easy to Digest: Aptamil First is designed to be gentle on baby’s tummy. This recipe features HMO 3’GL, and dual prebiotics GOS/FOS that feeds the good bacteria in the gut and promotes softer and regular stools that are closer to that of breastfed infants. Made without corn syrup. not derived from human milk
Real European Recipe: Aptamil Stage 1 infant formula delivers complete nutrition for babies from birth to 12 months. This 28.2 oz. canister makes 24 8oz bottles for baby
Supports Immune System, Brain & Eye Health: Aptamil Stage 1 delivers DHA to help support brain & eye development, and Vitamin C & D to help support the immune system
With Dual Prebiotics GOS & FOS: This baby formula includes prebiotics GOS and FOS to help support baby’s digestive health, and key vitamins & minerals found in breast milk
No Palm Oil - Aptamil Stage 1 formula is made without palm oil, and developed for baby’s needs

FDA permitted and now available for purchase in the US: that has been inspired by 50 years of advanced breastmilk research. Source Euromonitor International Limited; Among the brands of Follow-on Milk Formula. Based on data reported by Euromonitor International Limited, Packaged Food 2022 edition, value sales RSP, 2021 data. Aptamil includes Almiron, Aptamil, Bebilon, Gallia and Nutrilon.

Aptamil’s Quality Assurance: Aptamil is committed to producing quality formula. At every stage of its development, Aptamil formulations are crafted with the care and expertise that every parent and baby deserves, undergoing a comprehensive and complete series of checks to give families confidence in choosing Aptamil.

PLEASE NOTE ADDITIONAL IRON MAY BE NECESSARY: For infants born prematurely, or with a low birth weight, with low iron levels at birth, or infants who are at risk for becoming iron deficient due to illness, additional iron may be necessary. Consult your child’s pediatrician for more information.
Contains cow’s milk: Not intended for babies with cow's milk allergies. Contains milk, soy and fish oil ingredients.
body.description: Aptamil® First Infant Milk is a nutritionally complete, easy to digest formula for babies 0-12 months, inspired by 50 years of breast milk research. Featuring dual prebiotics GOS/FOS to help support digestive health, DHA to help support brain & eye development, Vitamin C and D to help support the immune system, HMO 3’GL*, and key vitamins & minerals found in breast milk. Aptamil® First Infant Milk was developed by the passionate Aptamil team of more than 500 scientists and experts, to give your little one the nutrients they need to support baby’s development – from the #1 formula brand in Europe*. Please note: In some cases, supplemental iron may be needed. For infants born prematurely, or with a low birth weight, with low iron levels at birth, or infants who are at risk for becoming iron deficient due to illness, additional iron may be necessary. Consult your child’s pediatrician for more information.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Our Favorite Formula!
reviews.reviewText: I was researching formula and hated how all of the US based ones had palm oils and corn syrup solids. I ran across Aptamil and decided to keep it on hand as a back up feeding option. My baby is breastfed a majority of the time, but I wanted to keep a formula on hand in case there was a time I could breastfeed for whatever reason.Baby happily takes the bottle and keeps it down with no issues. We haven’t had any problems with gas or bowel movements either. I will say it does smell a little bit, but most formulas do and it’s not a deal breaker.I also love how the scoop snaps into the lid so I am not digging through the formula trying to find it. The built in leveler is nice too so you don’t have a heaping scoop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My breast baby likes it
reviews.reviewText: I exclusively breastfeed my baby up to 7 months but stopped due to being sick and finding a replacement was very hard for us. My baby had issues with other formulas, and having restless gassy babies is no fun. I bought this formula and she took it with ease. The nice things there's no corn syrup. She poops almost the same as a breastfeed baby and she really liked the flavor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this product . With my second baby I was looking for a natural formula that does not have all the extra things in it such as oils and chemicals like other formulas on the market . I love how clean it looks when you make a bottle almost perfectly resembling milk. Easy to digest helps with less spit up and gas for a happy baby

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the few products available in the United States that isn’t packed full of hidden sugars. It’s easy on the belly, preferred by both my picky kids who mainly breastfed and all in all a great formula for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally something without corn syrup
reviews.reviewText: We are so happy that we found this brand. It’s without corn syrup and without palm oil.We tried Bobbie and Similac and our son didn’t like both. But loved Aptamil from the first sip.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good product poor shipping
reviews.reviewText: I like the good quality in the product and my baby tolerates well. Sadly it does not get shipped in the best manner. More than once I have received the package and opened it to find an opened formula with the product spilled inside the box. Amazon is great every time and gives me a refund.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So far had no issues, good product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Weird smell and texture
reviews.reviewText: We bought this product many times in pharmacy and it was great but the one time we bought it on Amazon it had a very bad smell and texture, lot of deposit on the bottle that was almost hard to wash and it was not diluted well at all. Our baby suddenly didn’t like it anymore while he used to like it when we were buying it from the pharmacy.I don’t know what is wrong with this batch but it’s clearly not the same quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 10, 2022
reviews.reviewText: very well received by my baby, overall good product.
